metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6254 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.Description: A Vulnerability in OTRS AgentInterface and ExternalInterface allows thereading of plain text passwords which are send back to the client in theserver response-This issue affects OTRS: from 8.0.X through 8.0.37.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
